com.emc.esu.api

Class Metadata

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.emc.esu.api.Metadata

  • public class Metadata
extends java.lang.Object
    Encapsulates a piece of object metadata

      Metadata(java.lang.String name, java.lang.String value, boolean listable)
      Creates a new piece of metadata

    • Constructor Detail

      • Metadata

        public Metadata(java.lang.String name,
        java.lang.String value,
        boolean listable)
        Creates a new piece of metadata
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the metadata (e.g. 'Title')
        value - the metadata value (e.g. 'Hamlet')
        listable - whether to make the value listable. You can query objects with a specific listable metadata tag using the listObjects method in the API.

    • Method Detail

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Returns a string representation of the metadata.
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
        Returns:
        the metadata object in the format name=value. Listable metadata will appear as name(listable)=value

      • getName

        public java.lang.String getName()
        Returns the name of the metadata object

      • getValue

        public java.lang.String getValue()
        Returns the metadata object's value

      • setValue

        public void setValue(java.lang.String value)
        Sets the metadata's value. Use updateObject to change this value on the server.

      • isListable

        public boolean isListable()
        Returns true if this metadata object is listable

      • setListable

        public void setListable(boolean listable)
        Sets the value of the listable flag.
        Parameters:
        listable - whether this metadata object is listable.
